title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Analysis of Personality Traits and Value Perceptions for Online Learning Adoption

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational mathematics knowledge and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain how personality traits (openness, neuroticism) influence the selection of online mathematics learning tools
Learners can evaluate the functional, emotional, and social values of online learning to develop strategic learning approaches.
Through formative assessment, learners can improve their learning styles and the efficiency of online resource utilization.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
